name: Forgotten Isle Alpha 0.02
description:
Alpha 0.02 Change Log/New Features

-Brand New Island to explore.
-20 Customized Items (2 per class)
-Enhanced Plot Description
-Credits Page
-WASD Compatibility
-Some new art courtesy of Captain Tigglesworth: https://www.patreon.com/CaptainTigglesworth 
-New Enemies

Sorry it's been a minute everyone! 

Onslaught Gaming is proud to present the newest version of The Forgotten Isle. For some of you, the only version of this that you have seen was the simple choice selection at the intro of the game. This is a full version (thus far) that includes around an hour of game play, if not more!

There has been some kinks with working out some of the bugs from the previous version, but we are happy to say that we got them all. So give the game a try, please rate it and leave your comments below or on the Patreon link below. There is some new stuff going on over there for supporters so give us a look!

We also started a ko-fi account, the link will be below as well. If you do not feel like or
have the funds to support us on Patreon, you can give us a one time donation there as well.

As a final note, the game is available for playing on Newgrounds as well! That link is below like all of the others!

Please enjoy the game and thank you for playing it!

https://www.patreon.com/OnslaughtGaming
https://ko-fi.com/OnslaughtGaming

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/712351
